comments.en:
Large-format 6-ink printer, 42 inches or 60 inches wide.

PostScript printer, so it should be no problem to use this model under free operating systems.

Drivers for HP's RTL language are under developement in both the CUPS-1.2 and Gimp-Print projects.

You can also send HP-GL/2 drawings and JPEG images directly to the printer.

Consumables/Refills: 6 cartridges (CMYcmK)
